alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 30 at 9:33PM PST until February 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts 35 to 45 mph possible. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire and San Diego County Valleys. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys
